channel.title: Base 508 server (shops)
channel.description:
hi moparscape community,
well i am gods army (duh) and i was bored so i decided to download xeloxoft's smallscreen server.
so i was messin around with it.
features (V1):
[COLOR="DarkOrange"]npc dialouge pking bh godwars about 85% npc train (no monsters to train on cause i didn't feel like adding) object train etc.[/COLOR]
features (V2):
[COLOR="Sienna"]npc dialouge shops pking bh godwars about 85% npc train (no monsters to train on cause i didn't feel like adding) object train herblore fletching bone burying banking on bank added!!! bounty hunter has been updated to about 85%[/COLOR]
[SIZE="5"]V1 has 6 errors and V2 has no errors (i think) but just use V2 it is better[/SIZE]
well pics:
npc dialouge
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/aep3pi.jpg[/img]
shop:
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/t5j50n.jpg[/img]
bh (before updated):
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/2vjc5ex.jpg[/img]
godwars:
[IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/2wgyuzp.jpg[/img]
PIC V2 bone burying:
[IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/10iaxdl.jpg[/img]
potion drinking:
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/27yqzja.jpg[/img]
potion effect:
[IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/1znud0l.jpg[/img]
well this was just for fun, but here is a pic from my fullscreen project
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/fjomtx.jpg[/img]
lol i forgot the DL link: [URL=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?jmlmdtuwygd"]here is server v1[/URL] lol...
here is v2!!!!!: [URL=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?h3yi5mqu3yr"] here!!!!!!!!!!!![/URL]
DL'S HAVE BEEN FIXED
credits:
pali me xeloader bowdeath4!
[SIZE="6"]V3 is coming soon! with firemaking, duel, potions, etc!!!![/SIZE]

Everyone has trading frames, even I do… And if you were smart, you could use the Dueling Method to make trading WORK. Like I DID.
All skills work, that’s not hard at all…
minigames? wow… So difficult…

Once again, stop using R~S
